summary: 01_PRODUCT required documents are present, internal references resolve, scope boundaries are explicitly declared, and normative statements are clear without redefining other area ownership.

Validated 11 markdown files in 02_DESIGN. All 22 in-scope links resolved and token definitions are internally consistent, but 2 medium issues were found in scope-boundary clarity and required-doc ownership clarity.
Found 2 medium integrity issues in 03_API lifecycle/page-map alignment; required documents exist and checked in-scope links resolve.
04_DOMAIN documents are present and linked, but persistence timing semantics are ambiguous for several persistent entities during Phase 2.

Found 2 issues (1 high, 1 medium): a PageRoute contract mismatch between frontend routing specs and upstream API conventions, and UI copy ownership drift inside frontend notification rules. Required frontend docs are present and scoped wiki-links resolve.

Scoped backend SSOT audit found 2 issues: one required-doc manifest drift in README and one medium test-rule traceability gap for data write-policy rules. No broken markdown/wiki links were found in `06_BACKEND` documents.
